metadata.name: welovekittiex.xyz tie-dye v2
metadata.description:
Artist/Designer/Videographer: Mikaela Kautzky

To commemorate the launch of CryptoKitties at ETHWaterloo in 2017 we commissioned Mikaela Kautzky, a Canadian interdisciplinary artist living in the unceded traditional territories of the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam), Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), and səlilwətaɬ (Tsleil-Waututh) Nations, known as Vancouver, Canada.

Mikaela was asked to reimagine a V2 of the original tie-dye shirts that were made and worn by the original CK team members at ETHWaterloo 2017.

All the dyes used on the t-shirts were naturally grown, reused, and/or planted by Mikaela.

pink: madder
yellow: golden rod and marigold
blue: indigo 
brown: cutch 
line painting: rusty nails
